ValidationRule.description: The Attempted Credit Transfer and Attempted kWh Transfer fields are made to be required for new records created on or after 11/25/19.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( ISNEW(), DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)>= DATE(2019,11,25) ) && OR( ISBLANK(Attempted_Transfer__c), ISBLANK(Attempted_kWh_Transfer__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Attempted Credit Transfer and Attempted kWh Transfer fields need to be populated before this record can be saved.
